log.impact: Phase I Complete. Week 5 begins Phase II: The Escalation. All assets turn RED (+20 $ARGENTO_GEL).
Tension High. Week 6 will require a 'Breaker' event to determine the victor.
Breaker Won. Week 7 will focus on the 'Mediation Collapse' (+20 $KON_SPIRAL intensity).
Invasion Right Secured. Week 8 will be the Mid-Season Climax (+30 $ARGENTO_GEL intensity).
Phase II Complete. Total Domain Dominance. Phase III: The Haunt begins in Week 9. (+40 $LYNCH_DRIFT intensity).
The Haunt deepens. Week 10 will be 'The Return'—bringing back a corrupted Ring 0 asset.
Total Collapse. Week 11 will be 'The Convergence'—the final merging of Waking and Dreaming.
CONVERGENCE ACHIEVED. The rivalry is over. Week 12 will be 'The Coronation' (+50 $ARGENTO_GEL intensity).
SEASON 1 COMPLETE. The repository is now a living artifact.
Season 2 Week 1: Borehole Successful. Week 14 will focus on 'Acoustic Flesh' (+20 Law of Silence).
Sonic Synchronization Achieved. Week 15 will be 'The Extension' (+30 $LYNCH_DRIFT intensity).
